statements: DELETE FROM urban_green_spaces WHERE park_location = 'Central Park';
DELETE FROM urban_green_spaces WHERE park_id = 1 AND establishment_year < 2000;
DELETE FROM urban_green_spaces WHERE park_size > 10.5 OR establishment_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010;
DELETE FROM park_amenities WHERE park_id = 1 AND amenity_type = 'Playground';
DELETE FROM urban_green_spaces WHERE name LIKE 'Central Park%';
DELETE FROM City_Plan WHERE park_id = 7 AND city_name = 'New York';
DELETE FROM ParkTypes WHERE type_name = 'National Park';
